H0.text: Surface water is water found on the surface of the earth.

H1.text: Groundwater is water found on the surface of the earth.

H2.text: Reservoir water is water found on the surface of the earth.

H3.text: Runoff is water found on the surface of the earth.

A4.text: Surface water is water located on top of land, forming terrestrial (surrounding by land on all sides) waterbodies

A5.text: Levels of surface water lessen as a result of evaporation as well as water moving into the ground becoming ground-water.
